survey_name: Patient Satisfaction Survey for Primary Care Clinics
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients about their experiences with primary care services, including wait times, provider communication, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care you received during your most recent visit?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care you received during your most recent visit?

questions.question_text: How long did you wait in the clinic before seeing your healthcare provider?
questions.client_notes: Categorize wait times into logical ranges for easier analysis.

script.question_text: How long did you wait in the clinic before seeing your healthcare provider?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of the clinic?
questions.client_notes: Use a consistent scale for cleanliness ratings.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of the clinic?

questions.question_text: Did the healthcare provider explain your condition and treatment options in a way you could understand?
questions.client_notes: Assess clarity of communication, a key patient satisfaction factor.

script.question_text: Did the healthcare provider explain your condition and treatment options in a way you could understand?

questions.question_text: How easy was it to schedule your appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure appointment scheduling ease.

script.question_text: How easy was it to schedule your appointment?

questions.question_text: Were all your questions and concerns addressed during the visit?
questions.client_notes: Important to gauge whether patients felt heard.

script.question_text: Were all your questions and concerns addressed during the visit?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any issues with billing or insurance during your visit?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify billing problems.

script.question_text: Did you experience any issues with billing or insurance during your visit?

questions.question_text: If you experienced billing issues, please describe them:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific billing concerns.

script.question_text: If you experienced billing issues, please describe them:

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this clinic to family or friends?
questions.client_notes: Standard Net Promoter Score question format.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this clinic to family or friends?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our clinic?

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our clinic?
